page.title: Structure Properties Pane
page.introduction: The structure properties pane allows editing of the structure name and free text annotations. It also shows the size variable name and the voltge variable name (for membranes).

list.item: Structure name: Name of the selected volume structure in the model.
Size variable name: Variable having a numerical value equal to the selected volume structure's size in a simulation geometry.
Annotation: User notes associated with the selected volume compartment structure.
Structure name: Name of the selected membrane structure in the model.
Size variable name: Variable having a numerical value equal to the selected membrane structure's size in a simulation geometry.
Voltage variable name: Variable having a numerical value equal to (voltage(positive feature) - voltage(negative feature))
Positive (inside feature): The volume structure used in calculation of "voltage variable"
Negative (outside feature): The volume structure used in calculation of "voltage variable"
Annotation: User notes associated with selected membrane structure.
